defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Harold Newman Selected Correspondence #6191. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: July 1977. Regarding possible appointment as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: August 1977. Recommendation for appointment as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: October 1977 Councilgram. Congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: November 1977. Mostly ongratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: December 1977. Mostly congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: January 1978. Mostly ongratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: February 1978. Mostly congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: March 1978. Mostly congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 1978. Mostly congratulations to Newman on his appoint as Chairman of the New York State Public Employees Relations Board and his responses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: April 1988. Regarding David Randles' appointment as the New York Member of the Port Authority Labor Relations Panel. Includes an explanatory note from January 1998.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes letters of congratulations, news clippings, program, and other materials
